metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3247 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Missing error check and insufficient random bytes in HTTP Digest authentication for SOAP

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.4 - 8.1.7-1ubuntu3.5
libapache2-mod-php8.0 - 8.1.7-1ubuntu3.5
libapache2-mod-php8.1 - 8.1.7-1ubuntu3.5
libphp8.1-embed - 8.1.7-1ubuntu3.5

notes.Note: sbeattie> PEAR issues should go against php-pear as of xenial

criterions.comment: php8.1 package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1.7-1ubuntu3.5').
